summary: Run built-in diagnostics across configuration, cache structure, and source health. Optionally auto-fix common issues.

usage.description: Emit structured results for agents (each check reports status, category, and remediation hints).
Attempt automatic repairs (e.g., remove orphaned directories, refresh stale metadata).

agent_tips: Use before shipping a workspace snapshot or after manual filesystem edits.
Pair with `--format json` to create structured health dashboards.
If `--fix` repairs a source, consider following up with `blz validate <alias>` to confirm integrity.
